sys_ui_message.message:
Problems come and go, and we want to help you solve your technical problems as fast as possible. Click on the links below for:
1. [Resetting your password or unlocking your account](https://absahr.service-now.com/kb_view.do?sysparm_article=KB0012667) 2. [Self-service channels for faster technical assistance](https://absahr.service-now.com/kb_view.do?sysparm_article=KB0012650) 3. If you are an existing employee and need more information about acquiring a new laptop, you can do so by visiting the [IT Service Portal](https://absa.service-now.com/sp?id=index) or by dialling 0861 721 721.
For more information, please visit the [IT Service Portal](https://absa.service-now.com/sp?id=index).
